articles.title: Destiny 2 players are back on the AFK Forge farm in Season of Arrivals - Polygon
articles.description: Destiny 2’s Season of Arrivals recently launched, and players are already cheesing the new content. Players are using the Forges from Black Armory to farm Umbral Engrams and Altered Element.
articles.content: Bungie launched Destiny 2s latest season, Season of Arrivals, on June 9, alongside its reveal ofDestiny 2: Beyond Light this fall. But since the seasons launch, players have resurrected an old glitch… [+2138 chars]
